The Wedding of Your Choice


Your dream wedding comes to lifeat StoneBridge's picturesque country manor with it's impeccably kept grounds, and sweeping views of rolling hills. You and your guests will celebrate in secluded natural beauty with exclusive use of this unique property. Whether you decide to exchange vows by a babbling brook, pond-side, or in front of the charming manor, we want to make your dream a reality.

Stonebridge

Stonebridge Provides

  • Access to grounds 9 AM to 11 PM
  • Private & elegant outdoor venue with manicured lawns & pond side setting
  • Endless photo opportunities inside & outside
  • Exclusive use of the manor for bridal party preparation/pictures
  • Wedding arbor
  • Chairs for ceremony arranged to bridge's design
  • Tented reception area to accommodate 250 guests with dance floor
  • 72" round tables & chairs for reception
  • Assistance with set-up & Post wedding clean-up
  • Staff on-site during contracted time of your event for trouble shooting & assistance
  • Clean, comfortable restroom facilities
  • On-site parking with golf cart valet for elderly or disabled guests

Stonebridge Packages

Entire Weekend

Friday 3PM - Sunday 3PM


Start your celebration weekend at StoneBridge by welcoming out-of-town or bridal party guests, schedule a rehearsal dinner on the grounds, or begin wedding day preparationsin a relaxed setting.  You have full use of the entire property including the manor which sleeps up to 12 people. Check out is on Sunday afternoon, allowing you to savor the sweet memories of your special day with family and friends.  Enjoy a late morning brunch, host family for a gift-opening party, take in local restaurants or events or just bask in the beauty of your new life together before leaving for home.  This includes all wedding package provisions stated above.

Saturday

9AM - 11PM


Call to book your wedding as soon as possible as Saturdays are the most popular days for weddings and our dates are filling up fast. This package avails you to the charm of StoneBridge from morning to night.  Includes all items listed above.

Friday/Sunday

9AM - 11PM


To accommodate the various schedules, needs, and budgets of our brides we offer Friday or Sunday dates.  This package includes all wedding package offerings as stated above for those on a more limited budget.

Reception

Only!


If your dream wedding involves a church or off-site ceremony but still want to enjoy your reception at StoneBridgeâ€™s enchanted property, this package gives you that option.  Our convenient location just minutes from downtown Cumberland off of Rt. 220, makes iteasy for your guests to arrive quickly after your ceremony and enjoy hors d'oeuvres, cocktails, lawn games and mingle while you take post-ceremony photos.  Insideaccess to manor is available upon request.

Stonebridge

Your experience at StoneBridge is not just the exquisite panoramicscenery, the grand stone manor or the intimate private setting. It'sthe piece of mind that your day will be a dream come true as wecarry out all you have envisioned. We are committed to makingyour wedding a stress-free and joyous occasion allowing you tobreathe in every special moment of the beginning of the rest of your lives together.
